Validated to Active Check

con:request.name: SO Auth

<urn2:agreementData>\r <urn3:agreementId>${Properties#AgreementId}</urn3:agreementId>\r <urn3:bankId>${Properties#bankId}</urn3:bankId>\r <urn3:customerID>${Properties#customerid}</urn3:customerID>\r <urn2:firstName>Test</urn2:firstName>\r <urn2:lastName>Cust</urn2:lastName>\r <urn2:userAccount>\r <urn2:accountNumber>${Properties#DebitAccountNumber}</urn2:accountNumber>\r <urn2:currencyCode>NOK</urn2:currencyCode>\r <urn2:accountType>CoreAccount</urn2:accountType>\r <urn2:role>View</urn2:role>\r <urn2:role>Register</urn2:role>\r <urn2:role>Appprove</urn2:role>\r con:request.name: SOConfirm
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:urn="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_5" xmlns:urn1="urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_5"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>${Properties#DestinationAPP}</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>1.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#UserID}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials></wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${Properties#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>4201</wsc:orgid> <!--Optional:--> <wsc:orgunit>4201</wsc:orgunit> <!--Optional:--> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#CustomerID_PM}</wsc:customerid> <!--Optional:--> <wsc:locale>en</wsc:locale> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.2</wsc:ip> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <wsc:item key="Employee" value="${Properties#Value1}"/> <wsc:item key="PaymentChannel" value="INT"/> <wsc:item key="LogRef" value="be8bb5d0-b189-42d7-bdf5-389c6611364c"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:standingOrderStatusUpdateRequest> <urn:standingOrderKey> <urn1:agreementId>${Step2_PeriodicSOCreateWithPM#Response#declare namespace ns2='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_5'; declare namespace ns3='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_5'; //ns3:standingOrderCreateResponse[1]/ns3:standingOrderKey[1]/ns2:agreementId[1]}</urn1:agreementId> <urn1:agreementVersion>1</urn1:agreementVersion> </urn:standingOrderKey> <urn:standingOrderAction>CONFIRM</urn:standingOrderAction> </urn:standingOrderStatusUpdateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.con:query: select * from STO_AGREEMENT where AGREEMENTID = '${Step2_PeriodicSOCreateWithPM#Response#declare namespace ns2='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:domain:standingorder:v1_5'; declare namespace ns3='urn:srv.stord.fs.evry.com:ws:standingorder:v1_5'; //ns3:standingOrderCreateResponse[1]/ns3:standingOrderKey[1]/ns2:agreementId[1]}'
